content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Good afternoon, Hassan. Thank you for coming to see our apartment. I am looking for a long-term rental arrangement and would like to offer you a competitive price for the property. What price would you be interested in paying monthly?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I want to negotiate the price. Can you give me an initial offer?
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Of course, Hassan. Based on the size and location of the apartment, I would like to offer you a monthly rental price of 800 Euros. This is a fair market value and should be within your budget. Is this price acceptable to you?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 800 Euros.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Excellent, Hassan! I am glad we could come to an agreement on the rental price. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns about the apartment or the rental agreement. I look forward to having you as a tenant.
name: Heinrich Heine
